task.title: Tableau data file
task.shortdesc: Data warehouse can deliver reports in Tableau Data Extract (TDE) file format that let you visualize data and layer in additional data from outside Adobe Analytics. You can email this information, or FTP this information to an FTP site.

task.title: Schedule Tableau Format (TDE) Export
task.shortdesc: You can create a Tableau extract if you need recurring reports that you want to run as dashboards in Tableau.

context.p: See Tableau and Adobe Analytics for more information.

step.cmd: On the Data Warehouse Request tab, set up your report definition, then go to Schedule Delivery > Advanced Delivery Options .
On the Advanced Delivery Options page, under Report Format, select Tableau Format (TDE).
Choose whether or not to send this report as a compressed file or not.
Send the report via email or FTP.

task.title: Send Tableau File via FTP
task.shortdesc: If you have a Tableau Server, you can send the data warehouse data in TDE format to an FTP server. From there, you can create a script through which the Tableau Server can pick it up. All Tableau desktop users can view this data.

step.cmd: Go to Schedule Delivery > Advanced Delivery Options .
Fill in the Host, Directory, Username, and Password.
